description: I tried Python3 and QT6, and the font settings did not work at all. Also, dark theme did not work for QT6.

I love having an offline documentation browser, and Dash really sets a gold standard for me coming from my work-machine running macOS. To really cut-the-mustard, Zeal needs to be able to support more docsets. For example, using Dash, I can download the GoDocs for an arbitrary package. Here, I'm limited to just the standard library. It's still very useful! But, I hope there is continued development.
summary: Useful, hasn't caught up to Dash

description: Use this app for 1 year
don't even use it, it's been broken for months.
Very fun so far using for python methods seems like a very useful tool.
summary: does not appear to be broken

description: Good idea, poor implementation. No way to choose documentation version, for example if one needs documentation for PostgreSQL 11, app only offers PostgreSQL 12 documentation, without an option to choose the target version.
summary: No option to choose documentation version. Otherwise it is ok

description: Offline documentation always a plus. Flatpak version works good on my KDE neon, theming is consistent.
Perfect, so convenient.
It's very wonderful for me! Thank you very much !
perfect aplication

My only problem is that there is no tooling to turn a Doxygen/Sphinx/ReadTheDocs docset into a Zeal docset. It's reliant on Dash, but that basically assumes you have access to a MacOS computer to generate the docset in the first place.

Everything else it does as well as Dash, and it's libre. Don't bother with any other paid docset browsers. This is what you're looking for.
summary: Stable, great to have docs offline and not in browser tabs

description: Thank goodness it comes with dark mode, to help not strain my eyes. Great optional docs you can download, very well documented for all the languages I personally use! It could update some of the outdated UI but hey, is still fantastic and something I use often.
It shows ads on the starting screen. There is no privacy policy or data processing info on their page and it's not GDRP-compliant

At this point after 3 years without any update, it has to be considered abandonware. Even though there are still contributors adding work, the maintainer has no time to even make a new release from what is there. Very sad. Hope it will be forked soon.
That appliction made me find the best documention from resourse and no need to open browser and make search. everything there. Many thanks
summary: The best app, I use it everytime

description: Very clean UI and fast APP

I used the MacOS Dash for YEARS and now that my work environment is Linux its great to find an app similar called Zeal, which, ironically enough utilizes Dash.app docsets!  Work just as an amazingly as Dash.
summary: Have Dash For MacOS and Zeal for UbuntuOS

description: there are adds in the program
summary: there are adds in the program

description: Muy útil para tener la documentación disponible cuando no se tiene acceso a internet. Cubre la mayoría de los lenguajes.

Excelente aplicación a la hora de programar en distintos lenguajes, el tiempo no para y los ingenieros crean nuevas formas de introducir nuevos recursos cada día. También cuando te olvidas algún dato. Ideal para todos.
La mejor app para ayudarte a programar👌
Un recueil de plein de langages de programmation. Je suis débutant, et c'est mon support le plus utilisé. Indispensable.

Cette application à peu évolué en plusieurs années mais l'essentiel est là, une disponibilité a n'importe quel moment des beaucoup de documentations.

La dernière étoile c'est pour la recherche : les raccourcis font qu'il est extrêmement rapide d'ouvrir Zeal, sélectionner une documentation et rechercher dans cette documentation. Mais la recherche pourrais être un peu plus intelligente, même si elle est très performante il faut le dire.

Je me retrouve donc souvent a quand même ouvrir le site internet et rechercher dessus, c'est vrai pour bootstrap par exemple car je ne me souviens plus du nom des toute les classes utilisés, Une recherche fuzzy plus tolérante, même si coûteuse, pourrais être intéressante.
summary: Excellent et productive, recherche à améliorer

description: Локальная документация это клёво, но нужно больше документации хорошей и разной.
Отличная идея. Удобно. Справка по любому языку всегда под рукой.
Под рукой шпаргалка по любому языку. Хорошо, что можно выбирать язык.
Нет расширения на русском и системных вызовов !
I like this program
Это очень удобно!
没有真正打开浏览器的HTML好看，估计是因为dash的文档提取的时候就丢失了很多信息
